attributes.action: ensure that wrongly convicted people are not billed for the time that they spent in prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is possible for a wrongly convicted/ innocent individual to be charged/billed to recover the living costs of being wrongly convicted. This is wrong as the person has been wrongly convicted and is being made to pay the financial cost of being wrongly convicted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
